sentences.sContent: The waitress has offered her services to us.
sentences.sContent_eng: The waitress has offered her services to us.
sentences.sCn: 这个女服务生已经向我们自荐了。

sentences.sContent: Susan:Well, if a German man gives a thumbs-up tosgroupsa soda from a waitress in America, she might think he likes her!
sentences.sContent_eng: Susan:Well, if a German man gives a thumbs-up tosgroupsa soda from a waitress in America, she might think he likes her!
sentences.sCn: 苏珊：如果德国人在美国向女服务员伸出大拇指点汽水，她可能会以为他对她有意思呢！

sentences.sContent: At the tiny restaurant where Xinran eats lunch, the waitress tries to kill herself twice, each time after a little girl’s birthday party.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the tiny restaurant where Xinran eats lunch, the waitress tries to kill herself twice, each time after a little girl’s birthday party.
sentences.sCn: 在欣然吃午饭的小餐馆中，有个女服务员曾两次试图自杀。 每次都是在一个小女孩的生日聚会之后。

trans.tranOther: a woman who serves food and drink at the tables in a restaurant
